MS MCQs

    Introduction to Java on Azure

    »

    1. Where can I deploy my Maven-packaged Spring Boot application?

      App Service

      VM

      Spring Cloud

      All the above


    2. True or false: Maven helps to automatically deploy the application to Azure App Service.

      False. The Azure portal is the only way to deploy an application to Azure App Service.

      True. Maven can not only package the application, but also add the required plug-in and run the deployment to Azure App Service.


    3. What types of Java applications can be deployed on Azure?

      Desktop applications

      Microservices

      Monolithic applications

      All the above
